name: tumblr black by mi gbtpd
description: Feature: This style don't delete border that appers when the tab is dragged.
additional_info:
This style is no longer needed because Tree Style Tab has "metal appearance".

This style is inspired by Tree Style Tab with Fx3 new theme (http://userstyles.org/styles/4677) and Tree Style Tabs - enhance appearance (FF3) (http://userstyles.org/styles/5524).
